name: RIMES Technologies Limited
goal: RIMES is a global company specialized in managed data services. RIMES provides fit-for-purpose financial benchmark data feeds to Investment management, Insurance and Pension fund organizations. RIMES has a 20-year history of managed data expertise and innovation.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Research and Technology
euInitiatives: EU Benchmark Regulations, Market Abuse, MiFID.
